caseStudies.title: Start-ups Landscape – Anti-aging & Personalization
caseStudies.excerpts: The client wanted to have a complete scenario of technology/ research work that start-ups/ spin-offs (hereinafter, “start-ups”) are doing in the field of aging and personalization. This includes different types of aging solutions/ technologies (diagnostic, preventive, therapeutic, reversal) developed by start-ups and used to reduce the aging effects
